Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the extension of the Times Square business improvement district

Items.MatterName: Approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding pursuant to the fiscal 2010 expense budget.

Items.Title: Communication from the Office of Management & Budget - Transfer City funds between various agencies in Fiscal Year 2010 to implement changes to the City's expense budget, pursuant to Section 107(b) of the New York City Charter. (MN - 1)

Items.MatterName: Transfer City funds between various agencies in FY'10 to implement changes to the City's expense budget. (MN - 1)
